Title: Party Girl
Writer: Harry Birckmayer (screenplay), Harry Birckmayer (story), Sheila Gaffney (story), Daisy von Scherler Mayer (screenplay), Daisy von Scherler Mayer (story)
Actors: Parker Posey, Anthony DeSando, Guillermo Díaz, Donna Mitchell
Plot: Party girl Mary gets bailed out of jail by her librarian godmother. She starts working at the library, slowly fills her empty brain.
